header.title: An open source R&D lab
header.text: We research & develop peer-to-peer technologies that enable ownerless media applications, in the middle-and-upper-layers of the stack.

components.title: Research
components.subtitle: How is decentralisation shifting paradigms in video technology?

list.title: Networked services
list.text: Decentralization of compute resources can create networks with the convenience and scalability of cloud services, but the cost profile of running on bare metal hardware. We investigate and advance lower-level p2p video technology by building on top of them.

list.title: Cryptoeconomics
list.text: The deployment of financial incentives via self-executable contracts can lead to distinguished collective behaviours, from FOMO-driven games to highly trustless service-specific networks. We research cryptoeconomics across the web3 video stack, with a focus on distributed curation.

list.title: Content monetisation
list.text: Fractional ownership and programmable value: these properties of cryptoassets open up new ways of thinking monetisation. We built an embeddable, modular and extensible player developers can customise and use to play with an integrated ERC20 wallet. With paratii.js, developers can also build widgets and plugins, or leverage a p2p streaming engine.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.subtitle: Building with world-class open source technology
opensource.text: We contribute to, build upon, modify implementations and develop from multiple open source base-layer projects. Are you willing to contribute directly to one of them? We‚Äôre willing to support you.

team.title: People
team.subtitle: Contributors
team.text: Paratii is the result of contributions by dozens of people, from 8 countries (and counting). You can meet them here.

videos.title: Videos
videos.subtitle: Our videos
videos.text: You can find someone of the team regularly in (or invite to!) meetups, events and conferences mostly in Brazil, the U.S and Italy.

group.title: What is Paratii?
group.text: A non-profit entity that researches and develops technologies capable of changing the way you distribute and consume media online. You may have gotten to know us thgouh our research/educational initiatives, or through any of our products, like the Paratii player and The Lab web app (or 'portal', as some lile to call it).

group.title: Who is Paratii for?
group.text: We work with developers from around the world, and seek to foster technical talent to work on distributed networks such as Ethereum and IPFS, in Brazil. If you fit the profile, get in touch! We also help media institutions understand and leverage peer-to-peer technologies, besides promoting education.

group.title: What problems does Paratii tackle?
group.text:
For creators: demonetization, censorship and limited revenue options. For audiences: economic exploitation and lack of options. For advertisers: abusive prices and fraud in audience calculation.
Paratii‚Äôs decentralized architecture allows the platform to exist without requiring the gigantic infrastructure of traditional centralized services, because participants share computational resources. Also, video monetization is entirely in the users‚Äô hands, through contracts in the Ethereum blockchain. This works to free creators from institutions and platforms tied to the interests of large corporations - especially niche creators. Metrics and media opportunities are not held by a central agent, but public (respecting each user‚Äôs privacy settings) so that their value is dictated by the market without the necessity for middlemen.

group.title: How is Paratii different from other video platforms?
group.text: In comparison to Youtube, Vimeo and such, Paratii distinguishes itself on two fronts: tech and business model. On the tech side because it is built on decentralized architecture, which makes it free from the necessity of housing gigantic warehouses full of servers, for instance. On the business model front, Paratii is unique in granting the power over monetization and curation to its creators and audiences, allowing for diverse options in sustaining the production of content. Importantly, Paratii also does not charge fees or take a cut of any transactions that happen in the platform.

group.title: Who are Paratii‚Äôs competitors?
group.text:
In 2015, Preston Byrne wrote about using Ethereum contracts to execute micropayments in the distribution of video. Since then, an array of alternatives to traditional video platforms have appeared. Many claimed to be ‚Äúthe first decentralized video network‚Äù, but it‚Äôs hard to grant the title to one specific initiative. Each project tackles a specific problem, in theory, and many that may seem similar are actually complementary and need one another to function. Below, we list some of them:

Data Storage: IPFS, Swarm, Sia, Storj, Maidsafe and Decent compete in offering options for ‚Äúpeer-to-peer clouds‚Äù. They may be used as the ‚Äúbackend‚Äù for applications that need to communicate with large files and would rather not store them on the blockchain due to cost. They are analogous to Amazon S3, Dropbox, etc.

Blockchains with a specific purpose: VideoCoin, Theta, LBRY.io, Alexandria and Steem are examples of blockchains dedicated to a specific type of application - they integrate identity, payment, data storage, load distribution and reputation in a single network, under a single protocol. That is to say, they don‚Äôt operate on Ethereum, Bitcoin, or any other blockchain, and allow applications to be built on top of them.

‚ÄúAuxiliary‚Äù services: Livepeer and Stream are examples of protocols that are dedicated to solving a specific part of the video pipeline. The first, for instance, provides a network of ‚Äútranscoders‚Äù that prepare raw video files to be shown in many resolutions - the idea is to provide this service for applications that require it to offer optimal user experience on different devices and connections. At Paratii, for instance, we are experimenting with integrating Livepeer. That is, we are mixing different protocols and services in a single application.

Content aggregators: SingularDTV, Viuly, Viewly, DTube, PopChest and Lino have their distinctions, but their objective can basically be said to aggregate content and provide portals where fans can sponsor artists. In most cases, they are against advertising. Some of them are built on Ethereum; others on Steem; some are even built on Bitcoin.

Mobile applications: Props (YouNow), Current and Flixxo are examples of mobile applications with a similar purpose to the ones listed above. However, they are developed by centralized, profit-minded companies, and incorporate fees on certain transactions in order to maintain themselves.

Curation and governance: Lightstreams and Userfeeds propose solutions for organizing and recommending content, in a way that could be integrated into video platforms.

The way all these layers of technology can interact is still unclear. A couple of them might make up what we would call a ‚Äúplatform‚Äù. There are also cases in which half a dozen or more might intersect in a single platform. Many that seem identical are actually quite different (e.g. WebTorrent x IPFS). Also, some initiatives that aren‚Äôt currently integrated to the ones mentioned above might soon become part of the group, such as Bidio for advertisements and Userfeeds for recommendations.

We are still in the early steps of a journey that is gradually redesigning the panorama for video, content creation and online advertising. A market of two billion people awaits disintermediation. The path towards that goal demands collaboration, patience and experimentation.

group.title: I have a webpage or app that distributes videos. How do I use Paratii?
group.text:
If you have your own domain, a Wordpress page or an article on Medium that could use some extra life, all you‚Äôll have to do is paste a link like the following to show video on your content via the Paratii player: https://portal.paratii.video/play/XXXXXXXXXXXX

If you‚Äôre a developer and want to use distributed video in your app, the paratii.js library was made for you. It‚Äôs used to read and write on the Ethereum blockchain, interact with peers on the IPFS network and search on the Paratii index, for instance. With it, we want to allow anyone to build browser clients such as The Lab app (we‚Äôll provide a webpacked version for that) and also nodeJS based applications. All you need to initialize the library is the URL of an Ethereum node (the provider parameter) and the address for the ParatiiRegistry contract (the registry parameter). You can find current documentation here. Our newsletter and Gitter are the best channels to get update on the library‚Äôs development.

group.title: How do I upload a video to The Lab app?
group.text: It‚Äôs quite simple: access portal.paratii.video, create an account, confirm your e-mail address and drag your video file to the upload zone. The rest should be self-explanatory.

group.title: What kind of video can or can‚Äôt I upload?
group.text: In essence, any content related to peer-to-peer, cryptocurrencies or distributed systems that belongs to you or that you have permission to share, that is legal in its country of origin, and is not pornographic, can be uploaded to Paratii. Users that go through the upload process must accept the service‚Äôs terms of use.

group.title: Do I have to pay fees? How does Paratii make money?
group.text: No! Creating an account on The Lab app or using Paratii code is totally free. A non-profit Foundation sponsors bounties, invests in communcation and explores ways of achieving long-term sustainability without succumbing to schewed incentive structures.

group.title: How do I keep up with news about Paratii?
group.text: There are many ways! Sign up for our newsletter, follow us and check out our website to see what‚Äôs new. Feel free to ask questions and participate in the community by joining our Telegram group as well..

group.title: I represent a media outlet and want to write about Paratii - how do I get in touch?
group.text: If you‚Äôre interested in talking about Paratii in the press, send an e-mail to press@paratii.video and we‚Äôll be glad to chat!

group.title: Who is behind this?
group.text: Contributors spanning Brazil, the USA, Italy and Egypt. We are mostly developers, designers and creatives. Since all of our code is open source, a nonprofit - the Paratii Foundation - set up in Estonia is responsible for financing the efforts and resources employed in researching, developing and communication the technology and its products. So far we have been supported by private investors and one of the largest film and entertainment production companies in Brazil.

group.title: What does it mean for Paratii to use the ‚Äúblockchain‚Äù?
group.text: Blockchain is a digitally secured, inalterable public record. At Paratii, it is used so that all accounts, attribution information, key videos' metadata, and surrounding transactions transactions are secured against fraud and can not be lost or tampered.

group.title: Which blockchain is Paratii using? Are any others planned for?
group.text: Currently, Paratii uses the Ethereum blockchain. Today, Paratii operates on a testnet. We are closely following the development of Steem, EOS, and a few other base technologies. Our R&D team always has alternatives in mind, but right now our commitment is to the community in which we came up with and developed our technology.

group.title: How is Paratii‚Äôs architecture structured?
group.text: Instead of housing video files in huge warehouses of servers owned by a single company, this infrastructure is distributed between countless computers that make up the IPFS network, be they regular users or dedicated servers. The IPFS network is a peer-to-peer file systen, akin to BitTorrent. You can find a more detailed breakdown in our technical documentation.

group.title: Does Paratii support livestreaming or strictly on-demand video?
group.text: Livestreaming is still a few pull request away, and we'd love to embrace any adventurer willing to undergo the challenge (send us a note!).

group.title: 360¬∫ video and Virtual Reality: are they supported?
group.text: Support for 360 degree videos and VR are in our near-future plans. If you have developed on the Clappr player in the past, and want to push this feature forward, let us know.

group.title: Can Paratii run on any device?
group.text: The current player prototype runs on iOS and Android as well as Mac, Windows and Linux on the Chrome, Safari, Brave and Firefox browsers. We are constantly working to add support for more devices and systems.

group.title: Isn‚Äôt it dangerous to use my computer to store third-party files?
group.text: It‚Äôs as dangerous as browsing websites that use cookies - the personal information files that certain publishers warn you about storing on your machine (‚Äúthis website uses cookies‚Ä¶‚Äù). On Paratii, you don‚Äôt store whole files on your computer, but small random chunks of data. These chunks are stored in your browser‚Äôs local storage, and have no access to the device‚Äôs core memory. The user has full control over the expiration time of these files and how much space they‚Äôre allowed to take up, but this is usually limited by the browser itself at something between 5 and 10MB.

group.title: Is the codebase open? How can I follow along?
group.text: Yes! You may follow the activity on our Github repository and even talk to the dev team or ask questions on Gitter. Telegram is where you‚Äôll find more informal chatting.

join.title: Join
join.subtitle: Paratii Early Uploaders
join.text: Welcome to the Paratii Early Uploader sign up page! Where are you located?

call.text: Want to know more about Paratii?

header.title: Welcome to the world of decentralized video!
header.text: That means you‚Äôre the boss. Have you ever had a video of yours demonetized for no reason? No more! If you did the work to record your content, why should a bunch of middlemen make the money instead of you? It‚Äôs time for a change. It‚Äôs time for Paratii.

about.title: A developing project
about.text: We‚Äôve got people working all over the world (seriously, we‚Äôre in four countries) to make our vision of a better future for video content creators a reality. We‚Äôve got new stuff almost every week, so keep an eye on us!

status.title: Current state of the platform:
list: Upload: Enabled for mp4 files of up to 800mb
Token: operational in a test network, with a staking cost of 5PTI per video. 25PTI is gained when confirming your e-mail.
Monetization: Not yet enabled; videos can only be uploaded as free.
Discovery: Basic search has been implemented. Featured content is still manually selected by staff.

contact.title: Give us a shout!
contact.text: Your participation is vital in making Paratii the best it can be for the one who matters: you. On our Telegram group, the team is always ready and willing to listen and answer questions.

header.title: P&D na fronteira do v√≠deo online
header.text: Pesquisamos e desenvolvemos tecnologias peer-to-peer que suportam aplica√ß√µes de m√≠dia sem autoridade central.

components.title: P&D
components.subtitle: Novos paradigmas em tecnologias de processamento, entrega e monetiza√ß√£o de v√≠deos

list.title: Mercados em rede > Monop√≥lios
list.text: A decentraliza√ß√£o de recursos computacionais pode criar redes com a conveni√™ncia de provedores de servi√ßo em nuvem, mas ao custo marginal da execu√ß√£o do c√≥digo, mais energia. Investigamos e constru√≠mos sobre protocolos distribu√≠dos de transcodifica√ß√£o, armazenagem e distribui√ß√£o de arquivos.

list.title: Criptoeconomia
list.text: A implementa√ß√£o de incentivos financeiros em contratos autoexecut√°veis pode levar a fen√¥menos √∫nicos, de jogos de loteria massivos a redes performantes em um servi√ßo espec√≠fico. Pesquisamos aplica√ß√µes da criptoeconomia √†s tecnologias por tr√°s do v√≠deo online, com um foco em curadoria distribu√≠da.

list.title: Monetiza√ß√£o
list.text: Valor program√°vel e propriedade fracional: estas propriedades de cripto-ativos abrem portas para se pensar em novos modelos de monetiza√ß√£o. Constru√≠mos um player embed√°vel, modular e extens√≠vel, que desenvolvedores podem customisar e experimentar com uma carteira ERC20 integrada. Com a biblioteca paratii.js, tamb√©m podem criar widgets e plugins, ou usar um pipeline de streaming p2p.

opensource.title: C√≥digo Aberto
opensource.subtitle: Construindo com tecnologia descentralizada de ponta
opensource.text: Constru√≠mos sobre, modificamos implementa√ß√µes e contribu√≠mos com m√∫ltiplos projetos infraestruturais de c√≥digo aberto. Tem interesse em contribuir diretamente com um deles? Temos interesse em te apoiar.

team.title: Pessoas
team.subtitle: Contribuidores
team.text: Paratii √© o resultado de contribui√ß√µes de dezenas de pessoas, de 8 pa√≠ses (e contando). Conhe√ßa-as aqui.

videos.title: V√≠deos
videos.subtitle: Nossos v√≠deos
videos.text: Encontre com algu√©m da comunidade em (ou convide para!) meetups, eventos e confer√™ncias, principalmente no Brasil, EUA ou It√°lia.

group.title: O que √© a Paratii?
group.text: Uma entidade sem fins lucrativos que pesquisa e desenvolve tecnologias capazes de mudar a forma como voc√™ distribui e consome conte√∫do na internet. Voc√™ pode ter nos conhecido pelas nossas inciativas de pesquisa e/ou educacionais com c√≥digo aberto, ou por meio de nossos produtos, como o player Paratii e a aplica√ß√£o The Lab (que alguns chamam simplesmente de 'portal').

group.title: Para quem √© a Paratii?
group.text: Trabalhamos com desenvolvedores do mundo inteiro, e buscamos fomentar talento t√©cnico para programar sobre plataformas e redes distribu√≠das, como a Ethereum e o IPFS, no Brasil. Se voc√™ se encaixa no perfil, entra em contato! Tamb√©m ajudamos institui√ß√µes de m√≠dia a compreenderem e aplicarem tecnologias peer-to-peer, al√©m de promover educa√ß√£o.

group.title: Que problemas a Paratii se prop√µe a atacar?
group.text: Para criadores: desmonetiza√ß√£o, censura, e falta de flexibilidade nas op√ß√µes de renda. Para audi√™ncias: extingue a explora√ß√£o econ√¥mica e outras forma de viola√ß√£o. Para anunciantes, em breve: pre√ßos abusivos pela m√≠dia e susceptibilidade a fraudes.

group.title: Qual √© a diferen√ßa entre a Paratii e outras plataformas de v√≠deo?
group.text: Quando comparada ao Youtube, Vimeo e afins, a Paratii se distingue em duas frentes: tecnologia e modelo de neg√≥cios. Na tecnol√≥gica, por se sustentar em uma arquitetura descentralizada que independe de possuir enormes galp√µes de servidores. No modelo de neg√≥cios, por colocar o poder sobre a monetiza√ß√£o e a curadoria nas m√£os de criadores e audi√™ncias, permitindo diversas op√ß√µes para sustentar a produ√ß√£o de conte√∫do, al√©m de n√£o cobrar taxas para lucro pr√≥prio.

group.title: Quais s√£o os competidores da Paratii?
group.text:
Em 2015, Preston Byrne j√° escreveu sobre como usar contratos na Ethereum para executar micropagamentos atrelados a distribui√ß√£o de v√≠deos. De l√° pra c√°, surgiram uma gama vasta de alternativas a plataformas tradicionais de v√≠deo. Muitas clamaram ser ‚Äúa primeira rede de v√≠deo descentralizada‚Äù do mercado, mas √© dif√≠cil entregar o t√≠tulo a uma iniciativa em particular. Cada projeto, na teoria, ataca um problema espec√≠fico, e muitos que parecem similares, na verdade se complementam e precisam um do outro para funcionar. Vamos por partes:

Armazenagem de dados: IPFS, Swarm, Sia, Storj, Maidsafe e Decent competem para oferecer op√ß√µes de ‚Äúnuvens peer-to-peer‚Äù. Podem ser usadas como ‚Äúbackend‚Äù de aplica√ß√µes que precisam se comunicar com arquivos pesados, e evitam armazen√°-los em uma blockchain por conta do custo. An√°logos √† S3 (Amazon), Dropbox, e outros.

Blockchains com prop√≥sito espec√≠fico: VideoCoin, Theta, LBRY.io, Alexandria e Steem s√£o exemplos de blockchains dedicadas a um tipo espec√≠fico de aplica√ß√£o - integram l√≥gicas de identidade, pagamento, armazenagem de dados, distribui√ß√£o de carga e reputa√ß√£o em uma mesma rede, sob um mesmo protocolo. Ou seja: n√£o operam sobre Ethereum, Bitcoin, ou outra blockchain, e permitem que aplica√ß√µes sejam constru√≠das sobre elas.

Servi√ßos ‚Äúauxiliares‚Äù: Livepeer e Stream s√£o exemplos de protocolos que se dedicam a solucionar uma parte espec√≠fica do pipeline de v√≠deo. A primeira, por exemplo, prov√™ uma rede de ‚Äútranscoders‚Äù que preparam arquivos crus de v√≠deo para serem exibidos em diversas resolu√ß√µes - a ideia √© que seja integrada a aplica√ß√µes que requerem esse tipo de funcionalidade para oferecerem uma boa experi√™ncia de usu√°rio em qualquer aparelho ou conex√£o. Na Paratii, por exemplo, estamos experimentando essa integra√ß√£o, ou seja, mesclando os servi√ßos de protocolos diferentes numa s√≥ aplica√ß√£o.

Agregadores de conte√∫do: SingularDTV, Viuly, Viewly, DTube, PopChest e Lino tem suas dissimilaridades, mas basicamente se prop√µe a agregar conte√∫do e prover portais onde f√£s podem patrocinarem artistas. Na maioria dos casos, s√£o contra propagandas. Alguns s√£o constru√≠dos sobre Ethereum; outros sobre Steem; tem at√© aquelas que se sustentam sobre Bitcoin.

Aplicativos mobile: Props (YouNow), Current e Flixxo s√£o exemplos de aplicativos mobile com prop√≥sitos parecidos aos da categoria acima. S√£o, no entanto, desenvolvidos por empresas centralizadas com fins lucrativos, e incorporam taxas sobre certas transa√ß√µes para se manterem.

Curadoria e governan√ßa: Lightstreams e Userfeeds prop√µe solu√ß√µes para se organizar, permissionar e recomendar conte√∫dos, podendo ser integrados a plataformas de v√≠deo.

As intera√ß√µes entre todas essas camadas de tecnologia ainda n√£o s√£o claras. Um par delas pode constituir aquilo que chamamos de ‚Äúplataforma‚Äù. Mas tamb√©m h√° casos em que meia d√∫zia ou mais se encontram, transversalmente, em uma √∫nica ‚Äúplataforma‚Äù. Muitas que soam id√™nticas t√™m tecnologias na verdade bem diferentes (e.g. WebTorrent X IPFS). E algumas iniciativas que ainda n√£o est√£o sendo integradas √†s mencionadas acima, muito em breve, devem estar fazendo parte do bolo (por exemplo, a Bidio para an√∫ncios; e a Userfeeds para recomenda√ß√µes).

Ainda √© o come√ßo de uma jornada que est√°, aos poucos, redesenhando o panorama do v√≠deo, da cria√ß√£o de conte√∫do e da publicidade no meio digital. Tem um mercado de 2 bilh√µes de pessoas esperando para ser desintermediado. O caminho passa por muita colabora√ß√£o, paci√™ncia e experimenta√ß√£o.

group.title: Tenho uma p√°gina ou app por onde distribuo v√≠deos. Como passo a usar Paratii?
group.text:
Para os desavisados, nosso player √© como um player qualquer. Se voc√™ tem um dom√≠nio pr√≥prio, uma p√°gina Wordpress, ou um artigo no Medium que precisa ganhar vida, bastar√° colar um link como esse para materializar um v√≠deo no seu conte√∫do: https://portal.paratii.video/play/XXXXXXXXXXXX

Se voc√™ for desenvolvedor, e quiser usar v√≠deo descentralizado dentro de seus aplicativos, a biblioteca paratii.js foi feita para voc√™. Ela √© usada para ler e escrever na blockchain da Ethereum, interagir com peers da rede do IPFS e fazer buscas no Paratii index, por exemplo. Com ela, queremos permitir a qualquer um construir browser clients, como o paratii-portal (vamos prover uma vers√£o webpack‚Äôed para isso) e tamb√©m aplica√ß√µes baseadas em nodeJS. Tudo o que voc√™ precisar√° para inicializar a biblioteca √© a URL de um n√≥ da Ethereum (o par√¢metro provedor) e o endere√ßo do contrato ParatiiRegistry (o par√¢metro registro). Cheque a documenta√ß√£o atual aqui. Nossa newsletter e Gitter s√£o os canais certos para receber updates sobre a biblioteca.

group.title: Como fa√ßo pra submeter um v√≠deo √† Paratii?
group.text: √â simples: v√° at√© portal.paratii.video, registre sua conta, confirme o seu e-mail e arraste seu arquivo de v√≠deo para a zona de upload. O resto deve ser autoexplicativo. Se encontrar um bug (o que √© bem prov√°vel), pergunte no nosso grupo no Telegram!

group.title: Quais tipos de v√≠deos posso subir? E quais n√£o posso?
group.text: Em ess√™ncia, qualquer conte√∫do cujos direitos sejam seus ou voc√™ tenha permiss√£o de compartilhar, que seja l√≠cito no pa√≠s de origem, n√£o seja pornogr√°fico, e ofere√ßa um ponto de vista √∫nico sobre o universo peer-to-peer pode ser subido na Paratii. Usu√°rios que passam pelo processo de upload devem aderir aos termos de uso do servi√ßo.

group.title: Quanto custa?
group.text: O uso da tecnologia √© gratuito para quem desenvolve sobre ela. No app The Lab, o consumo √© gratuito, e as submiss√µes de v√≠deos s√£o limitadas por uma moeda fict√≠cia (üíé). Ao criar uma conta, voc√™ recebe üíé o bastante para subir alguns v√≠deos.

group.title: Preciso pagar taxa? Como a Paratii ganha dinheiro?
group.text: N√£o! Criar uma conta na Paratii √© totalmente gratuito. A Paratii est√° focada em criar valor, e no momento pesquisa maneiras eficientes, pr√≥speras e n√£o-intrusivas de captur√°-lo.

group.title: Como fa√ßo pra acompanhar as not√≠cias da Paratii?
group.text: Tem muitos jeitos! Assine nossa newsletter, acompanhe nossos canais e confira nosso site para ver o que h√° de novo! Fique √† vontade para fazer perguntas e participar na comunidade no nosso grupo do Telegram, tamb√©m, cujo link voc√™ encontra l√° em cima da p√°gina!.

group.title: Essa hist√≥ria j√° saiu na m√≠dia?
group.text:
Sim! Aqui est√£o algumas mat√©rias que falaram da gente at√© agora:

√âpoca Neg√≥cios: Brasileiros Criam Youtube Decentralizado com Ajuda do Blockchain

Coindesk: 3 Web Giants That Could be Decentralised on a Blockchain

Tecmundo: Brasileiros lan√ßam ‚ÄúYoutube sem servidor‚Äù que paga pelos v√≠deos em Ethereum

Criptomoedas F√°cil: Paratii - um novo consenso para v√≠deos descentralizados

Olhar Digital: Brasileiros criam rival do Youtube que paga em criptomoeda

Se voc√™ tiver interesse em falar sobre a Paratii na imprensa, mande um email para press@paratii.video e teremos todo prazer em bater um papo.

group.title: Quem est√° por tr√°s disso?
group.text: Contribuidores distribu√≠dos pelo Brasil, EUA, It√°lia e Egito. Somos, na maioria, desenvolvedores, al√©m dos designers e criativos. Como todo c√≥digo que produzimos √© aberto, uma entidade sem fins lucrativos - a Funda√ß√£o Paratii - sediada na Est√¥nia √© respons√°vel por financiar os esfor√ßos e recursos empregados e pesquisa, desenvolvimento e comunica√ß√£o da tecnologia e seus produtos derivados. Essa Funda√ß√£o j√° recebeu apoio de investidores privados e de uma das maiores produtoras de cinema e entretenimento do Brasil.

group.title: O que significa a Paratii usar ‚Äúblockchain‚Äù?
group.text: A tecnologia de blockchain refere-se, resumidamente, a um registro p√∫blico inalter√°vel assegurado digitalmente. Na Paratii, isso √© usado para que todas as transa√ß√µes e contas sejam asseguradas contra fraude, pois s√£o replicadas em computadores que comp√µem a rede. Tamb√©m significa que transa√ß√µes de valor s√£o uma feature nativa do sistema.

group.title: Qual blockchain √© usada? H√° alguma outra, nos planos?
group.text: Atualmente, a blockchain da Ethereum. Hoje Paratii funciona numa rede-teste, ainda permissionada. Acompanhamos de perto a evolu√ß√£o da Steem, da EOS, al√©m de algumas outras tecnologias de base. Nosso time de P&D sempre tem alternativas em vista, mas, hoje, nosso comprometimento √© com a comunidade em que surgimos e nos desenvolvemos.

group.title: Como √© a arquitetura da Paratii?
group.text: Ao inv√©s de os arquivos e poder de processamento necess√°rios para rodar uma plataforma dessa magnitude serem contidos em grandes galp√µes de servidores pertencentes a uma s√≥ empresa, essa infraestrutura √© distribu√≠da entre incont√°veis computadores que fazem parte da rede do IPFS. Voc√™ encontra mais detalhes na nossa documenta√ß√£o t√©cnica.

group.title: Permite livestreams, ou somente v√≠deos on-demand?
group.text: Ainda n√£o, estamos considerando e explorando integra√ß√µes com tecnologias de base para tal.

group.title: 360¬∫ e Realidade Virtual: d√° pra transmitir?
group.text: Suporte para v√≠deos 360 e VR ainda n√£o s√£o uma realidade, mas podem ser implementados por quem quiser se aventurar a customizar um plugin do Clappr, nosso player!

group.title: Funciona em qualquer aparelho?
group.text: O primeiro prot√≥tipo desenvolvido do nosso player funciona em MAC e Windows (al√©m de iPhone e Android), no navegador Chrome. A segunda vers√£o j√° funciona nos mesmos sistemas operacionais al√©m de Linux, nos navegadores Chrome, Safari, Brave e Firefox.

group.title: N√£o √© perigoso usar meu aparelho para guardar arquivos alheios?
group.text: √â t√£o perigoso quanto navegar em sites que usam cookies - aqueles registros de informa√ß√µes pessoais e de terceiros que certos publishers avisam estarem armazenando na sua m√°quina (‚ÄúEsse site usa cookies‚Äù...). Na Paratii, voc√™ n√£o guarda arquivos inteiros dos outros, mas sim peda√ßos pequenos aleat√≥rios, que chamamos de chunks. Esse peda√ßos ficam na armazenagem local do seu navegador, e n√£o tem acesso a mem√≥ria central do aparelho. O usu√°rio tem controle sobre seu tempo de expira√ß√£o, e o limite de espa√ßo a ser usado pode ser customizado, mas √© geralmente limitado pelo pr√≥prio browser a algo entre 5Mb e 10Mb..

group.title: O c√≥digo √© aberto? Onde posso acompanhar?
group.text: Sim! √â poss√≠vel acompanhar nosso reposit√≥rio no Github e at√© mesmo conversar com o time de desenvolvimento ou fazer perguntas pelo Gitter. O Telegram √© o espa√ßo certo para papos mais informais.

join.title: Join
join.subtitle: Paratii Early Uploaders
join.text: Bem-vindo √† p√°gina de inscri√ß√µes para o programa Paratii Early Uploaders! Onde voc√™ est√° localizado?

call.text: Quer saber mais sobre a Paratii?

button.label: Confira nossa se√ß√£o de perguntas frequentes

header.title: Seja bem-vindo √† primeira comunidade de v√≠deo descentralizada do Brasil.
header.text: Isso significa que quem manda √© voc√™: j√° teve seu v√≠deo desmonetizado sem motivo? Coisa do passado! Se voc√™ que se matou pra gravar o seu conte√∫do, por que tem um monte de gente no meio do caminho ganhando em cima disso? Chegou a hora de mudar. Chegou a hora da Paratii.

about.title: Um projeto em constru√ß√£o
about.text: Temos gente trabalhando no mundo inteiro (√© s√©rio, estamos em quatro pa√≠ses) pra transformar nossa vis√£o de um futuro melhor para os criadores de v√≠deo em realidade. Quase toda semana tem coisa nova, ent√£o fica de olho!

status.title: Estado Atual da Plataforma
list: Upload: Habilitado para arquivos .mp4 de at√© 800mb
Token: Em testnet (n√£o oficial), custo de 5PTI para subir um v√≠deo. Recebe-se 25PTI ao confirmar-se seu e-mail.
Monetiza√ß√£o: Ainda n√£o habilitada, v√≠deos apenas na op√ß√£o livre por enquanto.
Perfil/Canal: Informa√ß√µes b√°sicas e lista de uploads.
Discovery: Busca b√°sica implementada. Conte√∫do em destaque ainda selecionado manualmente.

contact.title: D√° um al√¥!
contact.text: Sua participa√ß√£o √© vital para fazer a Paratii ser a melhor poss√≠vel para quem importa: voc√™. No nosso grupo do Telegram, nossa equipe est√° sempre pronta pra te ajudar com qualquer problema ou responder suas perguntas.

group.title: What is Paratii?
group.text: Paratii is a new online platform for video that aims to change the way you publish and consume content on the internet. Through its decentralized architecture and democratic monetization model, as well as the flexibility to emerge on any web page or application, Paratii represents a paradigm shift and socioeconomic experiment.

group.title: Who is Paratii for?
group.text: Paratii is for everyone who wants to distribute and/or consume video on the internet. From everyday vlogging to huge productions, the platform aims for the best and fairest experience for spectators and content creators. Further on, Paratii will also strengthen its relationship with publishers (websites, portals and apps that integrate video in their services) and media buyers.

group.title: Is the service functional? When will it be launched?
group.text: Yes! You can head on over to paratii.video/join and start uploading your content right away. The portal is currently very basic but we're adding new stuff every couple of weeks. Sign up to our newsletter and keep up with our social media channels to be updated on upcoming features, such as tipping, public profile pages and community curation.

group.title: What problems does Paratii solve?
group.text:
For creators: demonetization, censorship and limited revenue options. For audiences: economic exploitation and lack of options. For advertisers: abusive prices and fraud in audience calculation.
Paratii‚Äôs decentralized architecture allows the platform to exist without requiring the gigantic infrastructure of traditional centralized services, because participants share computational resources. Also, video monetization is entirely in the users‚Äô hands, through contracts in the Ethereum blockchain. This works to free creators from institutions and platforms tied to the interests of large corporations - especially niche creators. Metrics and media opportunities are not held by a central agent, but public (respecting each user‚Äôs privacy settings) so that their value is dictated by the market without the necessity for middlemen.

group.title: How is Paratii different from other video platforms?
group.text: In comparison to Youtube, Vimeo and such, Paratii distinguishes itself on two fronts: tech and business model. On the tech side because it is built on decentralized architecture, which makes it free from the necessity of housing gigantic warehouses full of servers, for instance. On the business model front, Paratii is unique in granting the power over monetization and curation to its creators and audiences, allowing for diverse options in sustaining the production of content. Importantly, Paratii also does not charge fees or take a cut of any transactions that happen in the platform.

group.title: Who are Paratii‚Äôs competitors?
group.text:
In 2015, Preston Byrne wrote about using Ethereum contracts to execute micropayments in the distribution of video. Since then, an array of alternatives to traditional video platforms have appeared. Many claimed to be ‚Äúthe first decentralized video network‚Äù, but it‚Äôs hard to grant the title to one specific initiative. Each project tackles a specific problem, in theory, and many that may seem similar are actually complementary and need one another to function. Below, we list some of them:

Data Storage: IPFS, Swarm, Sia, Storj, Maidsafe and Decent compete in offering options for ‚Äúpeer-to-peer clouds‚Äù. They may be used as the ‚Äúbackend‚Äù for applications that need to communicate with large files and would rather not store them on the blockchain due to cost. They are analogous to Amazon S3, Dropbox, etc.

Blockchains with a specific purpose: VideoCoin, Theta, LBRY.io, Alexandria and Steem are examples of blockchains dedicated to a specific type of application - they integrate identity, payment, data storage, load distribution and reputation in a single network, under a single protocol. That is to say, they don‚Äôt operate on Ethereum, Bitcoin, or any other blockchain, and allow applications to be built on top of them.

‚ÄúAuxiliary‚Äù services: Livepeer and Stream are examples of protocols that are dedicated to solving a specific part of the video pipeline. The first, for instance, provides a network of ‚Äútranscoders‚Äù that prepare raw video files to be shown in many resolutions - the idea is to provide this service for applications that require it to offer optimal user experience on different devices and connections. At Paratii, for instance, we are experimenting with integrating Livepeer. That is, we are mixing different protocols and services in a single application.

Content aggregators: SingularDTV, Viuly, Viewly, DTube, PopChest and Lino have their distinctions, but their objective can basically be said to aggregate content and provide portals where fans can sponsor artists. In most cases, they are against advertising. Some of them are built on Ethereum; others on Steem; some are even built on Bitcoin.

Mobile applications: Props (YouNow), Current and Flixxo are examples of mobile applications with a similar purpose to the ones listed above. However, they are developed by centralized, profit-minded companies, and incorporate fees on certain transactions in order to maintain themselves.

Curation and governance: Lightstreams and Userfeeds propose solutions for organizing and recommending content, in a way that could be integrated into video platforms.

The way all these layers of technology can interact is still unclear. A couple of them might make up what we would call a ‚Äúplatform‚Äù. There are also cases in which half a dozen or more might intersect in a single platform. Many that seem identical are actually quite different (e.g. WebTorrent x IPFS). Also, some initiatives that aren‚Äôt currently integrated to the ones mentioned above might soon become part of the group, such as Bidio for advertisements and Userfeeds for recommendations.

We are still in the early steps of a journey that is gradually redesigning the panorama for video, content creation and online advertising. A market of two billion people awaits disintermediation. The path towards that goal demands collaboration, patience and experimentation.

group.title: I am a content creator and wish to migrate platform. What advantages can I find in Paratii?
group.text: Independent creators have been ignored by the big video platforms for too long. At Paratii, you are our number one priority, and everything from the underlying technology to the economic incentives carries that philosophy. The monetizing of your videos does not depend on a corporation deciding if they‚Äôre valid or good enough, and is directly in your control. You may opt for advertisements, pay-per-view, and even offer incentives for watching and sharing your videos, nourishing an audience and making it a community. Also, you‚Äôll be able to hold tokens (official launch projected for Q3 2018) and reap the economic benefits conferred by them.

group.title: I have a webpage or app that distributes videos. How do I use Paratii?
group.text:
The service is designed to be universally embeddable on the web. This means that your website can have all of its video content ‚Äúhosted‚Äù on Paratii, while at the same time showing it with no additional friction to the end user - superficially, it‚Äôs just like any other player. If you have your own domain, a Wordpress page or an article on Medium that could use some extra life, all you‚Äôll have to do is paste a link like the following to show video on your content: https://portal.paratii.video/play/XXXXXXXXXXXX

If you‚Äôre a developer and want to use decentralized video in your app, the paratii.js library was made for you. It‚Äôs used to read and write on the Ethereum blockchain, interact with peers on the IPFS network and search on the Paratii index, for instance. With it, we want to allow anyone to build browser clients such as the Paratii portal (we‚Äôll provide a webpacked version for that) and also nodeJS based applications. All you need to initialize the library is the URL of an Ethereum node (the provider parameter) and the address for the ParatiiRegistry contract (the registry parameter). You can find current documentation here. Our newsletter and Gitter are the best channels to get update on the library‚Äôs development.

group.title: How do I upload a video?
group.text: It‚Äôs quite simple: access portal.paratii.video, create an account, confirm your e-mail address and drag your video file to the upload zone. The rest should be self-explanatory.

group.title: What kind of video can or can‚Äôt I upload?
group.text: In essence, any content that belongs to you or that you have permission to share, that is legal in its country of origin, and is not pornographic, can be uploaded to Paratii. Users that go through the upload process must accept the service‚Äôs terms of use.

group.title: Are there advertisements? Subscriptions? How can I monetize?
group.text: The form of monetizing content will always be in the hands of whoever created it - from running ads to accepting subscriptions, donations, or even charging per view. Currently, none of those options are enabled yet. The first one to be activated will be direct donations, then pay-per-view, and finally subscriptions and advertisements. In the medium-term, you won‚Äôt be lacking in options to be compensated for your work. Do you have ideas for a monetization process that we might not have thought of? How about jumping on our Telegram and sharing them?

group.title: Do I have to pay fees? How does Paratii make money?
group.text: No! Creating an account on Paratii is totally free. Part of the issued tokens (12%) are granted to the Paratii Foundation, a nonprofit that aims to foster research, development, and expansion of the network. The foundation benefits if the platform is a success, grows, and the native token appreciates in value - which grants us the resources to invest in communcation, tutorials and training of the core development team, for instance. These tokens, however, will be issued slowly over four years, so that incentives are structured in a way to guarantee the sustainability of the technology in the long-term.

group.title: How do I keep up with news about Paratii?
group.text: There are many ways! Sign up for our newsletter, follow us and check out our website to see what‚Äôs new. Feel free to ask questions and participate in the community by joining our Telegram group as well..

group.title: I represent a media outlet and want to write about Paratii - how do I get in touch?
group.text: If you‚Äôre interested in talking about Paratii in the press, send an e-mail to press@paratii.video and we‚Äôll be glad to chat!

group.title: Who is behind this?
group.text: A team spanning Brazil, the USA, Italy and Egypt. You can find information on the team and each person‚Äôs social channels here. We are mostly comprised of developers, as well as designers, creatives and those in business positions. Since all of our code is open source, a nonprofit - the Paratii Foundation - set up in Estonia is responsible for financing the efforts and resources employed in researching, developing and communication the technology and its products. We get paid in cryptocurrency. We are supported by private investors and one of the largest film and entertainment production companies in Brazil.

group.title: What does it mean for Paratii to use the ‚Äúblockchain‚Äù?
group.text: Blockchain technology can be summed up as a digitally secured, inalterable public record. At Paratii, it is used so that all transactions of the PTI token are secured against fraud and can never be lost, because they are replicated in every single computer that composes it - depending on the scale, it could be millions of them!

group.title: Which blockchain is Paratii using? Are any others planned for?
group.text: Currently, Paratii uses the Ethereum blockchain. We are on the way to being on the public network; today, Paratii operates on a testnet. We are closely following the development of Steem, EOS, and a few other base technologies. Our R&D team always has alternatives in mind, but right now our commitment is to the community in which we came up with and developed our technology.

group.title: How is Paratii‚Äôs architecture structured?
group.text: Paratii is built on a decentralized architecture. This mean that, instead of housing the files and processing power required to run a platform of this magnitude in huge warehouses of servers owned by a single company, this infrastructure is distributed between countless computers that make up the network, be they regular users or dedicated servers, and they are rewarded for doing their part in keeping the service running. You can find a more detailed breakdown in our technical documentation.

group.title: Does Paratii support livestreaming or strictly on-demand video?
group.text: We are progressing towards allowing livestreaming on the platform. This should become possible in the next few months.

group.title: 360¬∫ video and Virtual Reality: are they supported?
group.text: Support for 360 degree videos and VR are in our near-future plans, and we should add this capability soon (after livestreaming, of course). Technically, it‚Äôs not a huge challenge to implement.

group.title: How does the network sustain itself with no servers? Where are the files?
group.text: The files are distributed between the computers of everyone who uses Paratii and those who dedicate machines to serving content, and are sent to whoever requests them. It works similarly to a torrent, or programs such as Stremio or Popcorn Time. The file storage protocol we use for this is called IPFS, or Interplanetary File System.

group.title: Can Paratii run on any device?
group.text: The current player prototype runs on iOS and Android as well as Mac, Windows and Linux on the Chrome, Safari, Brave and Firefox browsers. We are constantly working to add support for more devices and systems.

group.title: Isn‚Äôt it dangerous to use my computer to store third-party files?
group.text: It‚Äôs as dangerous as browsing websites that use cookies - the personal information files that certain publishers warn you about storing on your machine (‚Äúthis website uses cookies‚Ä¶‚Äù). On Paratii, you don‚Äôt store whole files on your computer, but small random chunks of data. These chunks are stored in your browser‚Äôs local storage, and have no access to the device‚Äôs core memory. The user has full control over the expiration time of these files and how much space they‚Äôre allowed to take up, but this is usually limited by the browser itself at something between 5 and 10MB.

group.title: Can anyone see everything I do on Paratii?
group.text: Not everything you do! Activity is anonymized, encrypted and is only sent out of your computer when it is directly relevant to an operation that must be executed. You‚Äôll have the option to remain anonymous indefinitely (though you might feel a bit lonely!). Once conducted, transactions are public and irreversible - that is, if you decide to support a video with some tokens, other people may see it.

group.title: Is the codebase open? How can I follow along?
group.text: Yes! You may follow the activity on our Github repository and even talk to the dev team or ask questions on Gitter. Telegram is where you‚Äôll find more informal chatting.

group.title: What is the PTI token?
group.text: PTI is Paratii‚Äôs currency. It is issued according to codebound rules, its inflation is non-manipulable and its distribution rewards curators that help to keep content organized and filtered. Some functions in the platform require the user to deposit and ‚Äústake‚Äù PTIs, losing the ability to transfer them for a determined period but keeping ownership over them, consequently becoming entitled to rewards. As well a staking unit, the token can be used to pay for videos, make paid subscriptions or buy advertising, further on. Click here for an in-depth summary of the PTI token, its uses, technology and distribution model.

group.title: What is having PTI good for?
group.text: We have a nice infographic to explain what the PTI token is all about and what you can do with it - check it out here.

group.title: Couldn‚Äôt an existing token be used instead?
group.text: It is important that the token‚Äôs utility be contained within the services provided by Paratii, so that its value is not contaminated by forces external to the microeconomy it supports. Since it is a staking unit, it‚Äôs vital that the same token ‚Äústored‚Äù by the system to execute certain functions also be used to reward those that perform these functions in accordance with collective objectives. A third (but no less important) reason for an isolated token is the possibility of implementing a ‚Äúmonetary policy‚Äù that benefits the network‚Äôs bootstrapping - incentivizing early adoption, for instance. It should be noted that PTI is issued through the Ethereum blockchain, and compatible with wallets that follow its protocols.

group.title: How do I get PTI?
group.text: First of all, any user that validates their registration gets a few PTI to start experimenting. This ‚Äúinitial gift‚Äù will be reduced in accordance to the userbase‚Äôs growth. There are a few different ways of acquiring PTI - the most direct one is to buy them from other users or exchanges with money, when the token is on the main net and is sold through third parties. It will be possible to earn PTI when interacting with the system in three different ways beside the initial gift: watching a video on the player, contributing to the curation of content uploaded to the system, or running a dedicated machine to serve content on the network.

group.title: Can it be mined?
group.text: Yes and no - PTI cannot be mined in the same way as Bitcoin, for instance, in which users dedicate processing power to compete for computing on the blockchain. The PTI is mintable by validating an identity and being an active staker at each given block, where active stakers are either well-behaving publishers or assertive curators.

group.title: How many PTI can there be?
group.text: The number of PTI tokens in existance will never go beyond 150 million. The issuance of new units slows down exponentially as the quantity available to the market approaches that number.

group.title: Can I get PTI yet?
group.text: Our plan is to initiate public distribution of the token in August. Keep an eye on our newsletter and social media channels to learn more as we approach that date.

group.title: What factors can appreciate or depreciate PTI‚Äôs value?
group.text: Supply and demand. The only factors that directly determine PTI‚Äôs market price are the market forces - the prices set in executed buy and sell orders. Demand may rise as creators seek out tokens to support or promote their videos, users participate in the curation process to get rewards, media buyers become interested in advertising on the platform or speculators bet on the platform‚Äôs future. On the supply side, the price may go down if users sell their tokens en masse; but it may also go up as tokens are staked and become frozen for a period, or as tokens become lost (deducted from circulation) or unredeemed by anonymous users who don‚Äôt know any better.

join.title: Join
join.subtitle: Paratii Early Uploaders
join.text: Welcome to the Paratii Early Uploader sign up page! Where are you located?

call.text: Want to know more about Paratii?

header.title: Welcome to the world of decentralized video!
header.text: That means you‚Äôre the boss. Have you ever had a video of yours demonetized for no reason? No more! If you did the work to record your content, why should a bunch of middlemen make the money instead of you? It‚Äôs time for a change. It‚Äôs time for Paratii.

about.title: A developing project
about.text: We‚Äôve got people working all over the world (seriously, we‚Äôre in four countries) to make our vision of a better future for video content creators a reality. We‚Äôve got new stuff almost every week, so keep an eye on us!

status.title: Current state of the platform:
list: Upload: Enabled for mp4 files of up to 800mb
Token: operational in a test network, with a staking cost of 5PTI per video. 25PTI is gained when confirming your e-mail.
Monetization: Not yet enabled; videos can only be uploaded as free.
Discovery: Basic search has been implemented. Featured content is still manually selected by staff.

contact.title: Give us a shout!
contact.text: Your participation is vital in making Paratii the best it can be for the one who matters: you. On our Telegram group, the team is always ready and willing to listen and answer questions.
